Issue.creator: elli-androulaki
Issue.summary: As a token application developer, I want to initialise a simplified Token client library using sample FabToken parameters without signing abilities
Issue.description: {color:#333333}Acceptance: I can setup the token client library using a fixed set of token parameters, and monitor the internal state of the created client to ensure that its initialization took place with the right parameters. The client library would not provide any further functionality at this point beyond setup.{color}
